biotools.summary: Novel and user-friendly web-based program that systematically connects a set of query kinases to kinase inhibitors based on quantitative profiles of the kinase inhibitor activities. Users can find kinase inhibitors for a set of query kinases (obtained from high-throughput “omics” experiments) or to reveal new interactions between kinases and kinase inhibitors for rational drug combination studies.

bioschemas.name: K-Map
